description: Our Business Administration program prepares students for leadership roles in today's dynamic business environment. Students develop skills in management, finance, marketing, and entrepreneurship through hands-on projects and internships with industry partners.
highlights: Accredited by the Association to Advance Collegiate Schools of Business (AACSB)
92% job placement rate within 6 months of graduation
Dedicated business innovation lab and incubator space
notable_faculty: Dr. Sarah Johnson, former CEO of Fortune 500 company

description: Our Mechanical Engineering program combines rigorous technical education with practical design experience. Students learn to apply principles of physics, materials science, and mathematics to design, analyze, and manufacture mechanical systems.
highlights: State-of-the-art fabrication lab with 3D printing and CNC machines
Annual participation in national engineering competitions
notable_faculty: Dr. James Lee, patent holder for 12 mechanical innovations

description: Our Studio Art program nurtures creative vision while building technical mastery across multiple mediums. Students develop their artistic voice through intensive studio practice, critical theory, and professional preparation.
highlights: Dedicated studio space for each senior student
Annual juried student exhibitions with cash prizes
Visiting artist program featuring renowned contemporary artists
notable_faculty: Professor Maria Garcia, whose work appears in major museum collections

description: Our Biology program explores the complexity and diversity of living systems from molecules to ecosystems. Students gain a strong foundation in biological principles while developing advanced laboratory and research skills.
highlights: Modern laboratories with genomic sequencing capability
Field research stations in three diverse ecosystems
notable_faculty: Dr. Michael Chen, recipient of National Science Foundation CAREER Award
